io.vertx.ext.json.schema.reactivex

Class SchemaRouter

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.vertx.ext.json.schema.reactivex.SchemaRouter

  • public class SchemaRouter
extends Object
    Represents a pool where parsed schemas are addressed and cached.
    It also contains a cache of including on top or inner level some json schemas that could eventually parsed later.
    You should not share this object between different threads

    NOTE: This class has been automatically generated from the original non RX-ified interface using Vert.x codegen.

      • resolveCachedSchema

        public Schema resolveCachedSchema(JsonPointer refPointer,
                                  JsonPointer schemaScope,
                                  SchemaParser parser)
        Resolve cached schema based on refPointer. If a schema isn't cached, it returns null
        Parameters:
        refPointer -
        schemaScope -
        parser -
        Returns:
        the resolved schema, or null if no schema was found

      • resolveRef

        public Future<Schema> resolveRef(JsonPointer pointer,
                                 JsonPointer scope,
                                 SchemaParser schemaParser)
        Resolve $ref.
        This method tries to resolve schema from local cache. If it's not found, it solve external references. It can solve external references on filesystem and remote references using http. When you pass a relative reference without protocol, it tries to infer the absolute path from scope and cached schemas
        Returns a future that can contain Schema or be null or can fail with a SchemaException or an IllegalArgumentException
        Parameters:
        pointer -
        scope -
        schemaParser -
        Returns:
        a succeeded future that contains the resolved Schema or failed with a SchemaException or an IllegalArgumentException

      • addSchema

        public SchemaRouter addSchema(Schema schema)
        Add a parsed schema to local cache. This method is automatically called by SchemaParser when a new schema is parsed
        Parameters:
        schema -
        Returns:
        a reference to this

      • addJson

        public SchemaRouter addJson(String uri,
                            JsonObject object)
        Add one or more json documents including schemas on top or inner levels. This method doesn't trigger the schema parsing
        You can use this schema if you have externally loaded some json document and you want to register to the schema router. You can later parse and retrieve a schema from this json structure using , providing the correct refPointer
        Parameters:
        uri -
        object -
        Returns:
        a reference to this

      • registeredSchemas

        public List<Schema> registeredSchemas()
        Returns:
        a list of all registered schemas
